title: Cutting to the Chase
description: How do you fix something you didn't break?Lizzy certainly doesn't have the answer. All she knows is that she needs to survive senior year, then get as far away from her dysfunctional family as possible. In the meantime, when she can't take the pressure, she eases it with the sharp edge of a razor blade.But, she's been cutting deeper and her thoughts are growing darker.Until she meets Michael. With him she finds relief.Now, maybe—just maybe—she can make it.14+ due to sexuality, language, and adult situations
author: Rose Phillips
